decoworld.model.world.entities.weapons

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.weapons.Weapon

  • public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    A weapon class that constructs virtual weapons that have interchangeable roles in the DecoWorld game's combat system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Weapon(java.lang.String name, double damage, int range, int speed, boolean consume, java.lang.String image)
      Creates a weapon with its own set of attributes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(java.lang.String name,
      double damage,
      int range,
      int speed,
      boolean consume,
      java.lang.String image)
        Creates a weapon with its own set of attributes.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the weapon.
        damage - How much damage is dealt with each swing on a scale of 0 to 1000.
        range - How far the weapon can reach relative to the user. Scale from a 0 to 1000.
        speed - How long each stab takes in milliseconds.
        consume - True if weapon is consumed (destroyed) upon use. False if not.
        image - The image name associated with this weapon.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the damage/range is less than 0 or greater than 1000.
